A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Completely disagree with many people who dislike the movie. Short and sweet is there are some parts you would like done better\, aspects of story that are just unanswered\, and a few odd parts\, but all that aside the movie was funny at points\, great fight scenes\, and as a mild fan boy of Star Wars not as big as some people but way more than many people\, it is not a disappointment. I need to see movies like this 3+ times to have a final opinion\, if you are same type my opinion is a good movie\, not great.
